== Tomboy Notes ==

Tomboy is a desktop note-taking application which utilises an '''<nowiki>[[Applets|applet]]</nowiki>'''.

Accessed Via its '''<nowiki>[[Applets|applet]]</nowiki>'''

== Key Features ==

* Table of contents

* Basic text formatting features

* Export to HTML

* Print

* Import from Sticky''''''Notes

* Uses plugins to extend features

== Installation ==

* Part of the default Ubuntu installation

== Hints and Tips ==

=== Use descriptive titles ===
When you have a large number of notes, this makes it easier to find individual ones
=== Even better with Dropbox ===
Use <nowiki>[[https://www.getdropbox.com/home|Dropbox]]</nowiki> to keep Tomboy on multiple machines in sync. See <nowiki>[[http://lifehacker.com/5302854/synchronize-tomboy-notes-with-dropbox|this lifehacker post]]</nowiki> and the <nowiki>[[http://www.starryhope.com/linux/2009/synchronize-tomboy-notes-with-dropbox/|original post on Starry-Hope Productions]]</nowiki>
